name: pm2.43

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wi(wi(w0, w1), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wi(wi(w0, w1), w1))

comment: Absorption of redundant antecedent. Also called the "Contraction" or "Hilbert" axiom. Theorem *2.43 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 106. (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-1993.) (Proof shortened by Mel L. O'Cat, 15-Aug-2004.)
